name: @ubiquity-os/daemon-planner
description: Automates GitHub issue assignment across organizations based on contributor capacity.

organizations.description: List of GitHub organizations to process issues for.

assignedTaskLimit.description: Maximum number of tasks that a user can be assigned to.

recommendationThreshold.description: Minimum matchmaking relevance score required for a user to be considered for assignment.

dryRun.description: When enabled, planned actions are logged but no assignments are executed.
